content: L'alfabeto dell'esperanto ha 28 lettere: a, b, c, ĉ, d, e, f, g, ĝ, h, ĥ, i, j, ĵ, k, l, m, n, o, p, r, s, ŝ, t, u, ŭ, v, z.
translations: eng:The Esperanto alphabet has 28 letters﹕ a, b, c, ĉ, d, e, f, g, ĝ, h, ĥ, i, j, ĵ, k, l, m, n, o, p, r, s, ŝ, t, u, ŭ, v,
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
